Key Match Events: Dalton Knecht scored 20 straight points in the fourth quarter and overtime as part of his 35 total on the night.
Post-Match Reflections: Austin Reaves praised Dalton Knecht's performance, comparing it to nearly hitting a hole-in-one.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers came from behind to earn the victory.
Others: Dalton Knecht hit 3-pointers of increasing difficulty.
